config.okzoomer.title: Ok Zoomer Config
config.okzoomer.cinematic_camera.tooltip: Defines the cinematic camera while zooming.
config.okzoomer.reduce_sensitivity.toolt: Reduces the mouse sensitivity when zooming.
"Sine" applies the transition with a sine function.
config.okzoomer.zoom_mode.tooltip: The behavior of the zoom key.
config.okzoomer.zoom_mode.tooltip.hold: "Hold" needs the zoom key to be hold.
config.okzoomer.zoom_mode.tooltip.toggle: "Toggle" has the zoom key toggle the zoom.
config.okzoomer.zoom_scrolling.tooltip: Allows to increase or decrease zoom by scrolling.
config.okzoomer.zoom_scrolling.tooltip.w: The functionality might not be final.
config.okzoomer.zoom_divisor.tooltip: The divisor applied to the FOV's zoom multiplier.
config.okzoomer.minimum_zoom_divisor.too: The minimum value that you can scroll down.
config.okzoomer.maximum_zoom_divisor.too: The maximum value that you can scroll up.
config.okzoomer.cinematic_multiplier.too: The multiplier used for the multiplied cinematic camera.
config.okzoomer.smooth_multiplier.toolti: The multiplier used for smooth transitions.
config.okzoomer.reset_to_preset.tooltip: Resets the config in a specific way once saved.
"Classic" makes the mod imitate OptiFine's zoom.
"Persistent" is based on the "Persistent" zoom mode.
